definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: In our history, staging refers to the era before the mid-nineteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 在我国历史分期上泛指十九世纪中叶以前的时代。

sentences.english: Beer paper trademark appeared about in middle 18th century.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒纸商标的出现大约是在18世纪中叶。

sentences.english: In the middle of last century, America and Japan initiated hierarchic vocal teaching.
sentences.chinese: 上世纪中叶，在美国和日本等国发展起了分层教学。

sentences.english: Modern oral implantology was given birth in the middle of 20 century.
sentences.chinese: 现代口腔种植学始于20世纪中叶。

sentences.english: By mid-century, urban dwellers will count for seven out of every ten people.
sentences.chinese: 到本世纪中叶，城镇居民将占总人口的十分之七。

sentences.english: The atelectasis of median lobe mainly due to inflamtion.
sentences.chinese: 中叶肺不张主要有炎症引起。

sentences.english: This concept originated in Britain in the middle of last century.
sentences.chinese: 这个概念在上世纪中叶的时候源于英国。

sentences.english: In the middle of Yuan Dynasty, the terracotta technology in CiZao reached its peak.
sentences.chinese: 元朝中叶，磁灶制陶技术达到鼎盛时期。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the etiologic types of children with right lung middle lobe syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解儿童右肺中叶综合征的主要病原类型。

sentences.english: Kabuki appeared in the mid-seventeenth century in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 日本的歌舞伎兴起于十七世纪中叶。

sentences.english: The Ming dynasty palace of the twentieth century, corruption.
These resulted from the gradual intensification of imperial power starting from the middle period of Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 诸如此者，皆与皇权自刘宋中叶以降渐趋强化有关。

sentences.english: It was built by Czar Ivan the Terrible in the mid-16th century.
sentences.chinese: 它是由“恐怖的沙皇伊凡”于16世纪中叶所建。

sentences.english: By the middle of the 18th century, French colonialists set up base Diyou Ken fort.
sentences.chinese: 18世纪中叶，法国殖民者在此建立据点迪尤肯堡。

sentences.english: By the mid-21st century, the city will become a first-class modern international metropolis in the world.
sentences.chinese: 21世纪中叶，上海将世界一流的现代国际化大都市。

sentences.english: Before the Middle Qing, Wunquan brine wells were primitive ones with natural state.
sentences.chinese: 清代中叶以前，温泉卤井是一种自然状态的原始井。

definition: early part (of a decade, century etc)/the first years

the not-very-distant past/modern times, excluding recent decades/(in the context of Chinese history) the period from the Opium Wars until the May 4th Movement (mid-19th century to 1919)/capitalist times (pre-1949)
late Ming and early Qing/around the middle of the 17th century
the early Ming (i.e. from second half of 14th century)
late Ming/first half of the 17th century
flourishing age (of the ceremonial tripod)/golden age
late Yuan and early Ming/mid 14th century
